# My favorite talks

Data Science in the Tidyverse - Hadley Wickham

[Extending R with C++: A Brief Introduction to Rcpp](http://dirk.eddelbuettel.com/papers/rcpp_rstudio_conf_2017.pdf) - Dirk Eddelbuettel
